page.title: 06 AFTER SCHOOL ACTIVITIES
page.content: What we mostly do is watch television but if it's sunny we play swingball or play on our roller-boots.When we get fed up with our roller-boots we play on the Rec. but when the School bus comes I run up to the bus to meet Claudette. Then I go pony riding with Claudette so I get my jeans on and boots and then go on the pony for an hour or sometimes two. When we come back from pony riding we go in and have our tea. Then we watch television until bedtime. We go to bed at 9 o'clock. {Charlotte and Keeley} I help my mum do the cooking and then I tidy the place up.After I go to the garage and get a paper and some sweets.I get 50p for spending money. Then I walk back and I play swingball with my sisters.Then mum calls us in for tea.
